login.title: Log in to your account
login.desc: Enter your email and password below to log in

register.title: Create an account
register.desc: Enter your details below to create your account
register.name: Name

forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.desc: Enter your email to receive a password reset link

reset_password.title: Reset password
reset_password.desc: Please enter your new password below

email_verify.title: Verify your email address
email_verify.desc: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
email_verify.sent_email: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

confirm.toggle_activate: Are you sure you want to activate this menu?
confirm.toggle_deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this menu?
confirm.delete_desc: Are you sure you want to move this menu to trash?
confirm.restore_desc: Are you sure you want to restore this menu?
confirm.force_delete_desc: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this menu?

user.title: User Management
user.desc: A list of all the users in the site.
user.pagination_info: Showing {from} to {to} of {total} result | Showing {from} to {to} of {total} results

delete.title: Disable User
delete.desc: Are you sure you want to disable this user?

setting.title: Settings
setting.desc: Manage your profile and account settings

profile.title: Profile information
profile.desc: Update your name and email address
profile.name: Name
profile.resend_email: Click here to resend the verification email.
profile.sent_email: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.desc: Delete your account and all of its resources
delete.warning_desc: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.question_desc: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

password.title: Update password
password.desc: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
